ygData.messageBody:
>By the way, I keep here people saying that they never
rooted before 12. Did you solo? What was your tatics? I started >rooting
and
nuking at 4 and I haven't stopped since. Even if it kept the mob off >of me
1/4
of the fight, it was still meant the difference of life or death to >me. By
level 10ish (I think, its been a while since then) I was rooting >Grizzleys
in
the Karanas, and often finishing them off before root would break.

I've been using Root since day one. Don't leave home without it memorized.
As yet, it's the only way I can think of to get a MoB off your back solo OR
grouped. I think you're at a disadvantage with any spells if you start off
with low INT. Human Wizards would not be my first pick for a Wiz although
it leads to great role-playability. RP is the reason I picked a High-Elf
against an Erudite/Gnome. If you're a power-leveler, go straight for an
Erudite and pump that bad boy up with all the INT you can. :) My buddy who
started his second char as a Wiz did just that and has had little problems
getting spells off.
(little punk has more INT than me already...BAH! =)

-- Lim'Dul
